17  package org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.sftp.test;
18  
19  import junit.framework.Test;
20  import org.apache.commons.vfs.FileObject;
21  import org.apache.commons.vfs.FileSystemManager;
22  import org.apache.commons.vfs.FileSystemOptions;
23  import org.apache.commons.vfs.impl.DefaultFileSystemManager;
24  import org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.sftp.SftpFileProvider;
25  import org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.sftp.SftpFileSystemConfigBuilder;
26  import org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.sftp.TrustEveryoneUserInfo;
27  import org.apache.commons.vfs.test.AbstractProviderTestConfig;
28  import org.apache.commons.vfs.test.ProviderTestSuite;
29  
30  /***
31   * Test cases for the SFTP provider.
32   *
33   * @author <a href="mailto:adammurdoch@apache.org">Adam Murdoch</a>
34   * @version $Revision: 480428 $ $Date: 2006-11-29 07:15:24 +0100 (Mi, 29 Nov 2006) $
35   */
36  public class SftpProviderTestCase
37      extends AbstractProviderTestConfig
38  {
39      public static Test suite() throws Exception
40      {
41          return new ProviderTestSuite(new SftpProviderTestCase());
42      }
43  
44      /***
45       * Prepares the file system manager.
46       */
47      public void prepare(final DefaultFileSystemManager manager)
48          throws Exception
49      {
50          manager.addProvider("sftp", new SftpFileProvider());
51      }
52  
53      /***
54       * Returns the base folder for tests.
55       */
56      public FileObject getBaseTestFolder(final FileSystemManager manager) throws Exception
57      {
58          final String uri = System.getProperty("test.sftp.uri");
59  
60          FileSystemOptions fileSystemOptions = new FileSystemOptions();
61          SftpFileSystemConfigBuilder.getInstance().setStrictHostKeyChecking(fileSystemOptions, "no");
62          SftpFileSystemConfigBuilder.getInstance().setUserInfo(fileSystemOptions, new TrustEveryoneUserInfo());
63  
64          return manager.resolveFile(uri, fileSystemOptions);
65      }
66  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
